casebody.data:
No. COA18-393 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 20, 2018

In the MATTER OF the Appeal of: MAXTON SOLAR 1, LLC, and ZV Solar 1, LLC, Appellants

From the decision of the Robeson County Board of Equalization and Review to deny the partial exclusion of certain personal property for tax year 2016

AFFIRMED.
